price: (Saa Da no) wɔ’bεpε sε wɔ’befiri Amanehunu gya no mu. Nanso wɔ’mmfri mu, wɔn wᴐ asotwee a ԑwᴐ hᴐ daa.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمَا هُم بِخَٰرِجِينَ مِنۡهَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna an yakhrujū mina al-nāri wamā hum bikhārijīna min'hā walahum ʿadhābun muqīmun
